example.name: just transitive
example.text: Anheuser-Busch Cos. said it-1 plans *trace*-1 to aggressively discount its major beer brands...

example.name: almost all args
example.text: John discounted the price of his eternal soul from eternal life and unimaginable wealth to one decent night's sleep.

example.name: all args
example.text: [John's dissertation]-1 was discounted *trace*-1 by everyone who read it as worthless drivel.
